archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Provide Service Recovery Proposal Notification
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Where recovery of services is likely to impact other in-use specific services, this process is responsible for providing appropriate notification of the recovery proposal. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Where recovery of services is likely to impact other in-use specific services, Mandatory this process is responsible for providing appropriate notification of the recovery proposal.
